data.title: Centerville, Indiana Current Local Time and Time Zone
data.meta_description: Current local time in Centerville, Indiana with information about Centerville, Indiana official time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
Current Local Time

Centerville, Indiana is officially in the Eastern Time Zone

The Current Time in

Centerville, Indiana is:

Wednesday

8/28/2024

9:44 AM

EDT

Centerville, Indiana

is in the

Eastern Time Zone

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Eastern Standard Time - is abbreviated as EST

Eastern Daylight Time - is abbreviated as EDT

UTC - GMT

Offset

Centerville, Indiana is GMT/UTC - 5h during Standard Time

Centerville, Indiana is GMT/UTC - 4h during Daylight Saving Time

Daylight Saving

Start Date

Centerville, Indiana starts Daylight Saving Time on

Sunday March 10, 2024 at 2:00 AM local time.
